menu.title: Black Coffee
menu.desc: Bold and aromatic, brewed from freshly ground beans for a pure caffeine kick.

menu.title: Hot Chocolate
menu.desc: Rich and creamy cocoa blended with steamed milk, topped with whipped cream.

menu.title: Vanilla Ice Cream
menu.desc: Classic vanilla ice cream made with real cream and Madagascar vanilla beans.

menu.title: Herbal Tea
menu.desc: A calming blend of chamomile, mint, and lemongrass—perfect for unwinding.

menu.title: Chocolate Milk
menu.desc: Smooth chocolate milk made with organic cocoa and fresh dairy.

menu.title: Banana Milk
menu.desc: Sweet banana blended with chilled milk for a refreshing tropical treat.

services.title: Fastest Door Delivery
services.desc: Get your favorite drinks and treats delivered to your doorstep in under 30 minutes.

services.title: Premium Coffee Beans
services.desc: We source our beans from top farms around the world for unmatched flavor and freshness.

services.title: Award-Winning Quality
services.desc: Recognized by local and international barista competitions for excellence in taste.

services.title: Online Table Booking
services.desc: Reserve your favorite spot in seconds—no waiting, no hassle.

comments.body: The espresso was bold and rich—just how I like it. Great job!
This latte is my new morning ritual. Creamy, smooth, and comforting
I wasn’t expecting much, but the cold brew blew me away. Super refreshing!
The mocha had the perfect balance of chocolate and coffee. Loved it!
I ordered the Black Coffee and it was exactly what I needed—strong, smooth, and full of flavor. Definitely coming back for more!

messages.subject: Inquiry about delivery times
messages.body: Hi, I placed an order yesterday and was wondering how long it usually takes to arrive in Madrid. Thanks!

messages.subject: Issue with payment
messages.body: Hello, I tried to pay with my card but it keeps getting declined. Can you help me resolve this?

messages.subject: Feedback on your espresso
messages.body: Just wanted to say your espresso is phenomenal. Rich, smooth, and exactly what I needed this morning!

messages.subject: Request for invoice
messages.body: Could you please send me the invoice for my last order? I need it for my records.

messages.subject: Suggestion for new flavors
messages.body: Have you considered adding hazelnut or coconut to your menu? I think they'd be a hit!

messages.subject: Loved the Black Coffee!
messages.body: Just wanted to say thank you—the Black Coffee was perfect. I’ll definitely be ordering again soon.
